fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka mainnet successful; participation recovered to ~98% after Prysm incident
Prysm bug caused 79% participation drop; Capella-era attestation heuristic resurfaced
BPO1 scheduled in ~1 week to raise blob counts

glamsterdam_cfi.highlight: EIP-7778 (block gas accounting without refunds) - CFI, universal support
EIP-7708 (ETH transfer logs) - CFI despite pricing concerns
EIP-7843 (slot number opcode) - CFI for future slot time changes
EIP-8024 (SWAP/DUP/EXCHANGE opcodes) - CFI with strong client support
EIP-8070 (sparse blob pool) - CFI conditional on CL confirmation

glamsterdam_dfi.highlight: EIP-8011 (multidimensional gas) - DFI as overly complex
EIP-7619 (Falcon PQ) - DFI; NIST format changes pending

organizational.highlight: ACDC Dec 25 and ACDE Jan 1 canceled; replacement being explored
FOCIL decision deferred to next ACDC; standard headliner process preferred

action_items.action: Release Prysm fix and post-mortem next week
Set up EIP-7979 breakout room to continue discussion
Prepare repricing EIP unbundling proposal for next call
Confirm EIP-8070 sparse blob pool on CL side

decisions.decision: Cancel ACDC Dec 25 and ACDE Jan 1; explore replacement

targets.target: Dec 18 ACDE - Resolve repricing, contract size, PQ precompile questions
